revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Vodafone |model=R208 |revision=B |manuf=Huawei |manuf_model= |availability= |fcc_id=QISR208 |pcb_id= |type=mobile hotspot |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=microSD card slot, battery, portable, screen |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=VodafoneMobileWiFi-XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^VodafoneMobileWiFi-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} Per the manual, the SSID format is expected to be :'''VodafoneMobileWiFi-XXXXXX''' :(upper case hex letters)
